```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(dlookr)
```

### Outlier Plot

Distributions of the dataset with **and** without outliers.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
plot_data <- params$data1
plot_data %>%
plot_outlier(value, col = "#663399")
```

### Outlier Table

Table including the selected sector company outliers.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
table_data <- params$data2
datatable(table_data,rownames = FALSE,class = 'cell-border stripe') 
```
